name: Asteroidea (working title) Closed Beta
description:
Currently in BETA! Closed except to friends, family, key holders, and those who purchase the game early here on Itch.

Join our Discord server:

Hazy Paw's Discord

If you purchase a copy of the game, let us know in the Discord server and we will promote you so you can view the closed beta channels.

Give us feedback, please!

If you buy a copy or receive a free key for the beta , you will have access to the game forever, including the free updates it comes with. Note: We may end up increasing the price over time but that will not affect previous purchases. 

Beta

Please note this project is currently in CLOSED BETA, which means that the game may not work some days and will change dramatically over time.

A special thank you to the following people for their amazing help:

  • Family_Whale
  • Friends and family who helped support us
